articles.title: Has BNY Mellon’s 50% Rally in 2025 Already Priced In Its Growth Story?
articles.mainIdea: Has BNY Mellon’s 50% Rally in 2025 Already Priced In Its Growth Story?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Has BNY Mellon’s 50% Rally in 2025 Already Priced In Its Growth Story?. If you are wondering whether Bank of New York Mellon is still a smart buy after such a big run, or if the easy money has already been made, you are not alone. The stock is up 50.7% over the past year and 222.2% over five years, even after a recent 2.2% pullback this week and a 6.5% gain over the last month, which signals that investors are actively reassessing its long term prospects. Recent headlines have focused on BNY Mellon's expanding role in custody, asset servicing, and digital... Related tickers mentioned: BK-PK.
